name: Alien Pet (AndreaAncona, Ruggio_23, Deirin, Andrea Teruzzi)
name_original: Alien Pet (AndreaAncona, Ruggio_23, Deirin, Andrea Teruzzi)
description:
Your new Alien pet has arrived but instructions are in alien language. 

Learn to translate the alien symbols and help your pet grow without making its needs fall below 0!
